[[inst_v_xor]]
==== V.XOR

*Syntax:* v.xor SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T><.not><<<shamt>, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Vector instruction (VEC engine).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_xor.svg[V.XOR encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* VEC

*Compression:* L64 (len=64)
